sheep.game
Class Game

java.lang.Object
  android.view.View
      android.view.SurfaceView
          sheep.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback
public class Game
extends android.view.SurfaceView
implements android.view.SurfaceHolder.Callback

This class is subclass of SurfaceView, which makes it "viewable" in an Android application. It contains a the main game thread, to which it also redirects all calls from both Android and users.
